entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit customer support. How can I help you today?
I need to return something. I bought a VeloBand Pulse a couple of weeks ago and it's just not working out for me. The heart rate monitor is completely inaccurate.
I understand you'd like to return your VeloBand Pulse. I'm happy to help with that. Can I get your order number please?
It's 74920185. And honestly, this is a pain. I bought it thinking it would help with my workouts, but the data is useless. I'm really not happy.

Thank you. I have your order here. I see you purchased the VeloBand Pulse on July 20th. Today is August 4th. So that's just under two weeks. Not a problem at all. Our return policy allows for returns within 90 days. I can process a full refund for you.
Wait, really? That's it? I was expecting a fight. I read something about a shorter window for electronics. I thought I saw something about the VeloBand Pulse having a limited return period.

Not at all! We want you to be satisfied with your purchase. While some items do have specific conditions, generally, the 90 days return policy applies. The 10 days restriction you were talking about might be for something else. The VeloBand Pulse falls under our standard policy. What is the reason for the return, I need to input it for my report?

The heart rate monitor is just wildly inaccurate. It's basically a useless smart watch for fitness tracking. I thought the VeloBand Pulse would be better. Okay, so what's next? Will I receive a return label?

Yes, absolutely. I've already initiated the return process. You will receive an email within the next hour with a prepaid shipping label. Simply package the VeloBand Pulse securely, attach the label, and drop it off at your nearest shipping location. Once we receive the returned item, your refund will be processed, and you should see it reflected in your account within 7-10 business days.
Okay, perfect. So, just to confirm, I have 90 days to actually ship it back, or just to start the process?

To start the process, we would expect to get it shipped within the standard shipping time. Also, if you have any issues at all, don't hesitate to call us back. If you feel the need to escalate it to a manager, they are also always available to help.
Fantastic! Thank you so much for your help. That was much easier than I expected. I really appreciate it.
You're very welcome! Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
No, that's all. Have a great day!
You too! Thank you for calling VeloFit.
